review: It works, but it's slow as molasses to respond to commands.  For example, say you're watching netflix and want to pause it... you open the app and the netflix app is slow to respond, but after a couple seconds it allows you to press pause.  It now takes at least 3-5 seconds before that command actually gets relayed to the device and actually pauses the video.Another problem is that since it doesn't have a remote and your phone or ipad is the device this is actually a pretty significant drawback.  A phone call comes in, and you can't pause the show because you would need to switch to the netflix app to pause it, but you don't have time to do that because the app is so slow.Do yourself a favor and get the fire stick instead.  The dedicated remote alone would be worth it, but it's so much more responsive as well.
